title: Forum and Chat
description: This is a forum with posts (which have upvotes and comments), privacy and public chat, and a user registration system coupled with a maintenance system for site admins, coded in html/php, css/bootstrap, jQuery, AJAX, SQL, and custom fonts and so on, optimized for multiple devices. It requires an Apache based server and sql to test.

title: Digital Ventriloquism
description: This is an attempt at an app which masks one's face with 2D models and tracks their movement with inbuilt expressions. It also has voice modulation and chatting options.

title: Community App
description: More polished social media site inspired by StackOverflow, with threads, up/downvotes, comments and chat, written in Java (DAO model).

title: Spatial Data
description: An experiment with spatial data in various formats, and transforming the data into topographical representaions.

title: Artist Search (Web)
description: A website to search for paintings, gather information on them and review similar artists and paintings. Powered by Artsy.

title: Artist Search (Android)
description: A website to search for paintings, gather information on them and review similar artists and paintings. Powered by Artsy. Now ported to Android, uses modals and floating windows.

title: Weenix (Toy UNIX)
description: A toy version of UNIX, which comes with threads, processes, and a rudimentary kernel shell. Contains extensive test cases, capable of forking and dealing with files (ramfs, s5fs).

title: SwifTalk
description: A data integration plugin between software like Jira, Rally, SwiftKanban, etc. Uses recent technology and auto monitors pipeline health. No user action needed, automation is the key.

title: Paddleball
description: A simply pygame project where a paddle must be used to restrain a ball inside screen limits. Hosted on replit.

title: Spectrographic Derivation
description: Convert an image into a wav file whose spectrogram is the image using spectrpgraphic, generate the spectrogram back from sound and compare!

title: Simple text to music (randomized)
description: Converts simple UNICODE to 3-shingles and then to a sea shanty using ABC and MIDI formats, ultimately generating a WAV instrumental from it!
